thread.title: Russian State-Linked Hackers Targeted MH17 Investigators

title: Russian State-Linked Hackers Targeted MH17 Investigators
text:
Russian State-Linked Hackers Targeted MH17 Investigators 
Info Security Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Russian state-sponsored hackers linked to attacks on the White House and NATO members in the past have been caught targeting the investigation team behind downed airliner MH17.
